attributes.review: When I saw the app I was like okay, but when I opened it it was horrid, it kept asking for my location and kept crashing my phone it gave me these weird ringtones.
attributes.title: Worst app in history

attributes.review: I downloaded this hoping to find a way to my dad since he left me, but i still haven’t found him!! instead all i see is a dusty cheeto telling me about some “campaign” to be president of the US! Ugh.
attributes.title: Horrendous!!

attributes.review: Wish i could give it a score lower than 1 star. Horrible app, it was very uninformative and took up way too much of my data and space on my phone👎🏼
attributes.title: 😔 disappointing

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app not to long ago (for business purposes) and every time I logged on to this app it smelled so bad 🤮. Like seriously I don’t know what it was but there is definitely a problem with this app.
attributes.title: Stinky

attributes.review: this app should be deleted, it took for me at least 2 weeks to download the whole app and it was very slow. i also have a Cheeto PTSD, it’s very rare but a Cheeto popped up and I had a seizure. Delete this app please. It’s not good for children or people with Cheeto PTSD syndrome.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: It crashed my phone like 7 times and my phone has been glitching and overheating since then, it’s a new phone and it hasn’t done that with any other app
attributes.title: Trash absolute trash

attributes.review: I got to this app and omg its horrible. The message that is being spread is horrible. You are corrupting people. There is also so much inappropriate content. I think this app should be deleted for eternity. Also gen z for the win.
attributes.title: Oh no

attributes.review: Hello, I downloaded this app excited to use it but was disgusted instead. On the opening page there is a nasty ✨orange✨ Oompa Loompa creature. It was so scary that I jumped out of my bedroom window and received a traumatic brain injury, yet somehow, I’m still smarter than the Cheeto we call president.
attributes.title: Tik Tok will rise

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking  we would make America great again but all I see is a big orange with a wig on its screen!! Fairly disappointed and not funny at all! If I could leave 0 stars I would .
attributes.title: Orange 🍊

attributes.review:
this is not a good app. not sufficient to my needs as a black woman in america!!! I do not appreciate having an app that lies to their users with the words “make america great again” NEWS FLASH:
it was NEVER great. What would make it great is if this app is removed❤️
attributes.title: bad app
